LanguageData.JRWDrinkerReconstruct.label: Drinker
LanguageData.JRWDrinkerReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #039274-1990 [DRINKER NISTI] CODENAME: IMBIBE >462
A dinosaur with quite an unusual name... until it was reclassified as Nanosaurus in 2018, alongside Othnielosaurus. The history of Nanosaurus - and the many taxonomic revisions of heterodontosaurids - is long and complicated, spanning from the 70's all the way up until today!
LanguageData.JRWDrinkerReconstruct.tools.teeth.label: teeth
LanguageData.JRWDrinkerReconstruct.tools.head.label: head
